value.0:
- Minimum: 0 XP 
- Kill Bonus: 2 (Only Killer Gets this) 
- Arcane Class Boost: 1 XP 
- Arcane Boost Cap: Level 10 
- Low Level Bonus: 2 XP (Up to Level 10) 
- Mid Level Bonus: 1 XP (Level 11 to 20) 
- Epic Level Bonus: 0 XP (Level 21 and Up) 
- CR Differential for Kill Bonus: CR5 
- Party Bonus Rate: 20 (This is a Bonus for More than 1 Party Member!) 
- Maximum XP Per Kill: 100 XP 
- Character Max Level Difference: 40 (Means ALL Players can Party Up without Penalty) 
- Level Cap for XP from Kills: Level 40 (Means All Levels gain XP from Kills) 
- Maximum Distance to Kill to gain XP: 45 Meters 

Trap Disarm 
- Trap DC plus 25 is the XP Given 
- Minimum Trap DC to gain XP: DC 10 
- Maximum XP from any Trap: 75 XP 

Lock Picking 
- Lock DC plus 25 is the XP Given 
- Minimum Lock DC to gain XP: DC 10 
- Maximum XP from any Lock: 75 XP
